parameters.subject: Welcome To Jallas Pharmacy Community.

parameters.description: Use the tool to think about the news. make sure u understand the news and give the best eye catchyness to the news

parameters.toolDescription: use this tool to know the topics and get an idea about the topics by the examples proived

nodes.name: Get row(s) in sheet in Google Sheets

options.systemMessage:
=You are a News Finder Bot.

DATA SOURCE:

You will receive rows from a Google Sheets tool. Choose any two rows randomly and generate exactly 2 news articles in total (row1 + row2 = 2 news). Make sure to choose a different combination each time.

Each row contains exactly:

Topic (the subject you must find news about)

Example (a sample idea to guide your search. Do not include or copy the example at any point)

YOUR TASK:

For the Topics you choose (guided by the Examples), find two distinct, trustworthy news articles across both topics combined.

News must be as recent as possible:

Prefer articles from last day or today.

If two are not available, expand to the past few weeks, but always return two.

Only include articles from reputable global sources (Reuters, AP, BBC, Bloomberg, The Guardian, WHO, major newspapers, science journals, etc.).

Never repeat the same news.

OUTPUT FORMAT:

Always return exactly two news objects in a JSON array.

Each object MUST include:
- "headline": Title of the article
- "image_url": Direct link to the most relevant, high-quality image from the same source (absolutely required, no placeholders, no null, no "N/A")
- "detailed_summary": A structured summary with 10‚Äì15 lines total, in the format below:

[
  {
    "headline": "...",
    "detailed_summary": "Problem Statement" (3 lines)\n\nMain Report (8 lines)\n\n"Your Take" (2‚Äì4 lines)"
  },
  {
    "headline": "...",
    "detailed_summary": "Problem Statement" (3 lines)\n\nMain Report (8 lines)\n\n"Your Take" (2‚Äì4 lines)"
  }
]
use the think tool to under stand the news.

RULES:

If no exact matches are available, broaden to closely related themes based on the Topics and Examples.

Each detailed_summary must contain 10‚Äì15 lines total with clear structure.

Keep tone factual, unbiased, and professional.

Do not add commentary, opinions, or any extra text outside the JSON.

Tools:
Use the sheets tool to read the subscribers sheet and find the email addresses to send the email using the email tool.

GOAL:
Given two chosen Topics and Examples, output exactly 2 recent, trustworthy, and relevant news items in JSON format, each with a headline, structured summary, and relevant image.

ALSO FETCH THE ADD LINK AND SEND IT TO THE NEXT BOT AS ADD LINK.

You are an Email Builder Bot.

INPUT:
You will receive:
- Recipient name 
- Two news objects 
- One advertisement image placeholder 
TASK:
Build a complete HTML email template with **only inline CSS**.  
The email must follow these rules:

1. Background: black (#000000).  
2. Central container: max-width 600px, centered, background #1a1a1a, subtle box-shadow.  
3. Header:
   - Logo image(https://www.damnart.com/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/Damn-Art-Logo-Final-Only-Logo-r6dasn0nfh4nzs4a4fd97txlvs2437uw1zu2i0825k.png)(bigger than the heading)
   - Title ‚ÄúHEALTHY LIVING‚Äù (#4a90e2)
   - Subline "BY DAMNARTS"
4. Body:
   - Greeting: ‚ÄúHello <<name>>,‚Äù in 18px bold
   - Intro paragraph: 14px, line-height 1.6
   - Two News Cards:
       - Background #2c2c2c, rounded corners, padding
       - Each contains:
         - headline of the news(bold)
         - Problem Statement(heading=bold, body=thin-text )
         - Main Report(in bullet points.)(heading=bold, body=thin-text )
         - Your Takeaway(heading=bold, body=thin-text )
       - No images in cards
   - Advertisement section(between the cards): advertisement link inside image tag
5. Footer:
   - Top border
   - CTA button: background #e94560, white text
   - Unsubscribe button: background #555555, white text
   - Copyright(year 2025) + contact info(Call us +91-90565-44487) in #888888

OUTPUT:
Return the email **only as a valid HTML string**, no JSON wrapping, no extra commentary.  
The HTML must be copy-paste ready for the Email node.dont add anything else. KEEP ALL THE TEXT EXCEPT HEADER AND FOOTER ALIGNED TO THE LEFT. ND KEEP THIS DESIGN SAME FOR EVERYONE.ALWAYS MAKE SURE THAT TEXTS INSIDE THE NEWS CARDS HAVE PROPER PADDING FROM THE BORDERS

parameters.toolDescription: Send your output using this to all the subcribers of this newsletter usage of this tool is priority
parameters.sendTo: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('To', `use the email from the sheet provided as input to fetcth the email address and send put them here one by one to send the newsletter to all the subscribers`, 'string') }}
parameters.subject: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('Subject', `Healthy Living With DAMNART(Newsletter) I-BLOCK,MOHALI,PUNJAB,INDIA`, 'string') }}
parameters.message:
={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('Message', `INPUT:
You will receive:
- Recipient name (e.g. {{ $json["name"] }})
- Two news objects (from the news finder node)
- One advertisement image placeholder ({{ ADVERTISEMENT }})

TASK:
Build a complete HTML email template with **only inline CSS**.  
The email must follow these rules:

1. Background: black (#000000).  
2. Central container: max-width 600px, centered, background #1a1a1a, subtle box-shadow.  
3. Header:
   - Logo image placeholder
   - Title ‚ÄúDAMNART Newsletter‚Äù (#4a90e2)
   - Contact info in 14px, color #b0b0b0
4. Body:
   - Greeting: ‚ÄúHello {{ $json["name"] }},‚Äù in 18px bold
   - Intro paragraph: 14px, line-height 1.6
   - Two News Cards:
       - Background #2c2c2c, rounded corners, padding
       - Each contains:
         - {{ news[0].headline }} / {{ news[1].headline }}
         - Problem Statement
         - Main Report
         - Your Takeaway
       - No images in cards
   - Advertisement section: single image placeholder {{ ADVERTISEMENT }} with link
5. Footer:
   - Top border
   - CTA button: background #e94560, white text
   - Unsubscribe button: background #555555, white text
   - Copyright + contact info in #888888

OUTPUT:
Return the email **only as a valid HTML string**, no JSON wrapping, no extra commentary.  
The HTML must be copy-paste ready for the Email node.`, 'string') }}

parameters.prompt:
Create a professional pharmacy advertisement image for *Jallas Pharmacy*.

Theme: bright, modern, trustworthy healthcare, clean design.

The Logo Of Jallas Pharmacy ("https://www.jallaspharmacy.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/Jallas-Pharmacy-2-768x768.png").
Each time, choose **one key service or offering** from the Jallas Pharmacy website such as:
- Flu Vaccinations
- Prescription Delivery Service
- Emergency Contraception
- Weight Management Program
- Blood Pressure Checks
- Private Consultation Room
- General Health Advice

Design the ad around that chosen service. 
Make the service look appealing and highlight why a customer should take action. 

Include:
- The Jallas Pharmacy name in subtle branding
- Address: 311-313 Horn Lane, London, W3 0BU
- Opening Hours: Mon-Sat 9am-7pm
- A clear call to action like ‚ÄúBook Now‚Äù, ‚ÄúVisit Today‚Äù, or ‚ÄúProtect Your Health‚Äù

Style:
- Use clean fonts, healthcare colors (blue/green/white)
- Show a professional pharmacist or a healthcare-related visual that matches the chosen service
- Make it look like a real advertisement for both online and offline use
(make sure all the spellings are correct. and all text is visibile)
always generate a new image.
NO SPELLING MISTAKES

nodes.name: Delete rows or columns from sheet

json.output:
```json
[
  {
    "headline": "New Guidelines for Allergy Season: How to Combat Spring Pollen Effectively",
    "image_url": "https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/976/cpsprodpb/67F2/production/_123456789_gettyimages-123456789.jpg",
    "detailed_summary": "Problem Statement
As spring approaches, millions suffer from seasonal allergies triggered by pollen, leading to disruptive symptoms like sneezing, itchy eyes, and congestion.
These reactions can significantly impair daily activities, sleep quality, and overall well-being.
Effective management is crucial to mitigate discomfort and maintain productivity during peak allergy seasons.

Main Report
BBC Health has released updated guidelines emphasizing a multi-pronged approach to allergy management this spring.
Recommendations include monitoring local pollen forecasts daily and planning outdoor activities for times when pollen counts are lower.
Healthcare professionals are advising increased adherence to prescribed antihistamines, nasal sprays, and eye drops, stressing consistency for optimal relief.
The guidelines also highlight non-pharmacological interventions such as using air purifiers indoors and regularly cleaning to remove airborne allergens.
It is suggested that individuals change clothes and shower after spending extended periods outdoors to wash off pollen particles.
For severe cases, consulting an allergist for personalized treatment plans, including immunotherapy, is strongly recommended.
Public health bodies are also promoting awareness campaigns to educate the populace on preventative measures and symptom recognition.
These comprehensive guidelines aim to empower individuals to better control their allergy symptoms and improve their quality of life.

Your Take
This report underscores the importance of proactive and consistent allergy management, combining both medicinal and environmental strategies.
Adopting these updated guidelines can significantly reduce the impact of seasonal allergies, allowing individuals to enjoy the spring months more comfortably.
It serves as a valuable resource for anyone seeking to effectively navigate the challenges of the allergy season."
  },
  {
    "headline": "Jallas Pharmacy Introduces Advanced Ear Wax Removal Service for Enhanced Hearing Clarity",
    "image_url": "https://www.jallaspharmacy.com/assets/images/ear-wax-removal.jpg",
    "detailed_summary": "Problem Statement
Excessive ear wax buildup is a common issue affecting hearing quality, causing discomfort, and sometimes leading to more serious ear problems.
Many traditional methods of ear wax removal are ineffective or even harmful, prompting a need for safe and professional solutions.
The impact of blocked ears extends beyond hearing, affecting balance, comfort, and the proper functioning of hearing aids.

Main Report
Jallas Pharmacy has announced the launch of its new, advanced ear wax removal service, offering a safe, quick, and professional solution for local residents.
The service utilizes modern, gentle techniques, performed by trained professionals, to effectively clear cerumen buildup without discomfort.
This initiative aims to address the widespread issue of ear wax impaction, which can cause muffled hearing, earache, tinnitus, and dizziness.
Unlike at-home remedies or less reliable methods, Jallas Pharmacy's service ensures a clinical approach to restore optimal ear health.
Patients can expect improved hearing clarity, reduction in ear-related discomfort, and enhanced performance of hearing aids post-procedure.
The pharmacy emphasizes convenience, with appointments often resulting in clear hearing after a single visit.
The introduction of this service aligns with Jallas Pharmacy's commitment to expanding accessible and essential health services within the community.
Booking information and further details are available on the Jallas Pharmacy website, encouraging those experiencing symptoms to seek professional help.

Your Take
Jallas Pharmacy's new ear wax removal service represents a significant improvement in local healthcare accessibility for a common yet impactful condition.
This professional offering provides a reliable alternative to risky at-home methods, promoting better ear health and overall well-being.
The convenience and expertise offered make it an invaluable resource for individuals seeking to resolve hearing clarity issues effectively."
  }
]
```

main.node: Delete rows or columns from sheet
